pages.text: $(bgreen)Ice Shroom$() frowns, not because it's unhappy or because it disapproves, but because of a childhood injury that left its facial nerves paralyzed.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)75$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)instant-kill$() plant, which will $(baqua)freeze and chill$() all enemies in 20 blocks area after planted. $(bred)It will sleep at daytime$().
$(bpurple)Special :$() It can destroy all $(bred)Flame Balls$() in 40 blocks$().$(br)$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() Not Available.
